content: SPX Coating Removal Diamond Cup-Wheel (For DG/DGH 150) Ultimate diamond cup wheel for the DG/DGH 150 diamond grinder – for removing thin coatings such as paint and adhesive ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Diamond blades and cup wheels- - - ### FEATURES:Features Cup wheel with larger abrasive diamonds – for faster removal of thin coatings Long lifetime thanks to advanced cooling of segments and special steel body Low vibration thanks to advanced core balancing technology Engineered for reliability – CD welding and highest-grade materials used throughout Coarse diamond grit for rough grinding Applications Removal of thin coatings such as adhesive and paint ### TECHNICAL DATA: Tool type: Concrete grinder DG/DGH 150 Base material: Coatings, Adhesive, Paint, Epoxy Product Class: Ultimate Technical Data | Tool type | Concrete grinder DG/DGH 150 | Base material | Coatings, Adhesive, Paint, Epoxy | Product Class | Ultimate ### ITEMS- 2270821 - 6 SPX Coating Removal Cup Wheel - Package Size 1 pc
